title: Just me or does Vayne's Condemn take forever to apply its Damage?
body: Really annoying when you E a minion when under turret and it knocks it back then it dies to turret anyway - it appears to take like half a second to apply it's damage after striking the minion.

replies.body: Better question is why are you using E on minions? Learn to last hit better and you won't even bother to notice it because you won't be using it.

Early game I don't have enough attack speed to kill a specific minion sometimes because of my attack speed and attack animation speed so sometimes I E the occasional minion (Like 1 game in 30) to secure that extra last hit.

Screw that extra one last hit, deal with it, you still get some XP and most importantly you save your mana.

Answer me this, how many times have you been in a pinch, that last second shit that you wish you had 0.5 seconds less CD and that 20 extra mana that would have killed the enemy and saved your ass?

Now think how many times that has happened and what idiodic shit you pulled just before they ganked you and killed you and realise, maybe I should not have wasted that mana and CD on an enemy.

Because it is impossible to have eyes on all 5 enemy at all times in the game, no matter how good you are and how many wards you think you have, someone, somewhere will pop up, kill you and ruin your game because you thought, oh look, 20GFUCKIJUSTDIED!
I'll snowball hard off that extra 20g Tho just sayin.

> [{quoted}](name=Level1Pentakill,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=vLw188ww,comment-id=0001000000000000,timestamp=2015-09-16T15:50:07.740+0000)
>
> I'll snowball hard off that extra 20g Tho just sayin.

lol

You could also die an easily avoidable death that could take you out for 30 seconds more game time, even though that 20G and the G/sec tick while you are dead could net you that BF sword, coming back 30 seconds sooner with a pick axe, boots and dagger.

That extra MS/AS could net you more gold and survivability as you can move faster, avoid attacks easier, attack faster to get more last hits and save mana for when you get ganked.

Or you could die, get that 20G, get the BF, maybe farm a little easier on each last hit, miss some other last hits due to not being fast enough and possibly not get away without the extra movement.

*Or I could miss that one last hit because my E damage takes ten years to apply, where I had made a call on that mana expenditure and deemed the 20 gold worth it and Riot had said f-ck you you don' tget your 20g because your E damage is delayed so I cry myself to sleep and cradle my knees about that 20g I never had in a game where 20g could be the difference between that clutch 1 HP instantly from that 20g netting me a HP potion; hence saving me from a death that turned into me taking out a penta or we could both be looking too deeply into this and you could see that I'm just annoyed because in that scenario I looked at my E and was like lol k - this is the 100th time this has been an option and I'm going to E this minion - and the turret killed it again because my E damage is retarded and it doesn't say it in the tooltip "this E is retarded do not last hit with it" so I tried to last hit with it again and it needs to state in the tooltip "retarded ability" so I have a reminder not to try these clutch last hits because it's happened to me a billion times and I want Riot to either fix it or at least come in and say "hey, yes it is retarded welcome to our f-cks given meeting you are the only one invited and we're not going-  and goodbye" or maybe look at it - but I was more here to confirm it because I wasn't sure if I just was having attention lapses or something every time it's happened to me and the E damage hasn't applied because I often just E it then go back to auto'ing other minions and sorta never looked deeply into it but It happened recently for what appears to be the billionth time and I just wanted a confirmation on whether this abilities damage application is retarded or it's just me.*

your E is 90 mana though and at level 3 thats like 40% of vaynes mana pool. 90 mana itself is 90% of a mana potion which is worth 30 gold which means you should only be E'ing a minion if it was worth no less than 27  gold, not taking into account its placement on cd. id really only do it if im going back after this or the next wave, otherwise she literally becomes the most vulnerable champ in the game. since you probably wont have tumble available until its too late (due to mana issues from E'ing too much minions lel) you are literally a slightly less squishier minion with 5 more movespeed in terms of escaping your enemies
I think that's true, I just go with it. I E minions and ignore it, about 10 seconds later they die, looks cool but totally useless
